title: Dr. Isabella Leung, ND - Mind-body Therapy Markham, Mind-body Therapy Naturopaths
description: Dr. Isabella Leung is a Naturopathic Doctor With a specialization in Mind-body Therapy. Contact Dr. Leung today to learn more.
cleaned_text: is a Naturopathic Doctor With a Specialization in Mind-body Therapy Mental attitudes and emotional states can be important elements in healing and disease. Naturopathic doctors are trained in counseling and stress management. Mind-body therapies such as Mindfulness meditation and Cognitive Behavior Therapy are also used.
